metadata.title: Anju Jewelry Janya Collection Mixed Metal Cuff Ring with Amethyst Stone
features: Adjustable Mixed Metal Cuff Ring with Stone Handcrafted by Artisans
Stylish and stunning accessory you can wear to any occasion
Sweet Reminder: Please keep the accessory away from perfumes, cosmetics and any other chemicals
Products are cadmium and lead free
description: Adjustable handcrafted stainless steel cuff ring with stone, brass and copper accents. Adjustable design made to fit all sizes! 1" wide at widest point, 3" long. Due to natural variations, all stones may vary. At Anju, we create unique handcrafted products that blend traditional craftsmanship with modern trends resulting in an artistic expression that is authentically Anju. By partnering with artisan communities, we are able to provide an economic opportunity for our artisans and their families in an environment that supports cultural heritage, creative expression, and fair trade practices.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "2.52 x 1.46 x 0.87 inches; 0.32 Ounces", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "October 1, 2019", "Manufacturer": "Anju Jewelry"}
